The Solver Package

The Solver package provides support for applying linear, nonlinear, and ODE solvers on a structured AMR patch hierarchy. The classes are divided into four categories:
  1. C++ interfaces to specific solver libraries (e.g., PETSc)"
  2. vector kernel support for data on an AMR composite grid"
  3. Implementation of an FAC solver
  4. Poisson solvers
  5. Nonlinear solver interface

All class names in the Mesh package are in the namespace "solv".
